original_title: We're Here to Stay: The History of Hands Off Washington and the Politics of Hate in Washington State
overview: In the 1990s, opponents of gay and lesbian rights put forward anti-gay initiatives patterned after Oregon's Measure 9. In response, supporters of gay and lesbian civil rights founded advocacy group Hands Off Washington. This documentary tells the story of Hands Off Washington, and of the struggle for gay and lesbian civil rights in Washington State.
title: We're Here to Stay: The History of Hands Off Washington and the Politics of Hate in Washington State
